import { memo, useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { english as englishTableCustomer, vietnamese as vietnameseTableCustomer } from '../../Languages/TableListCustomer' import { AiOutlineLeft, AiOutlineRight, AiOutlineSearch, AiOutlineDelete } from 'react-icons/ai' import { HiOutlineEye } from 'react-icons/hi' import { Menu, MenuItem, MenuButton } from '@szhsin/react-menu'; import '@szhsin/react-menu/dist/index.css'; import '@szhsin/react-menu/dist/transitions/slide.css'; import { BsThreeDotsVertical } from 'react-icons/bs' function ListCustomer({ languageSelected }) { const navigate = useNavigate() const [searchName, setSearchName] = useState('') const [numberPage, setNumberPage] = useState(1) const [numberOfPages, setNumberOfPages] = useState([1, 2, 3]) const [customers, setCustomers] = useState([ { id: '1', email: 'abc@gmail.com', firstName: 'ABC', lastName: 'Xyz', gender: 'Male', status: true }, { id: '2', email: 'xyz@gmail.com', firstName: 'XYZ', lastName: 'Ha Noi', gender: 'Female', status: false } ]) const table = languageSelected === 'EN' ? englishTableCustomer : vietnameseTableCustomer useEffect(() => { //choc api }, []) return (
{[...customers].map((item, index) => ( ))}
# {table.txtLoginEmail} {table.txtFirstName} {table.txtLastName} {table.txtGender} {table.txtStatus} {table.txtAction}
{index + 1} {item.email} {item.firstName} {item.lastName} {item.gender === 'Male' && table.txtMale || item.gender === 'Female' && table.txtFemale || item.gender === 'Other' && table.txtOther } {item.status ? : } } transition> navigate('/admin/view-partner', { state: { id: item.id } })}> {table.txtView} {item.status && {table.txtBlock} }
{numberPage > 1 && } {numberOfPages.map((item) => ( ))} {numberPage === 1 && numberOfPages.length > 1 && }
) } export default memo(ListCustomer)
